svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Real GDP per capita is measured using US$, inflation adjusted at prices of 2011. A single benchmark in 2011
makes these series suitable for studying the growth of incomes over time (but not for comparing income levels
